description.@en: Your voice booms with bravado and issues to any who you can envision – either nearby, lying in a ditch or upon a nearby battlefield where the fight rages on.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, all allies you can see can hear your words clearly, as if you were standing beside them. In addition, it grants a +10 Base Chance to any Leadership Tests you wish to make for the Duration of the spell.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but you triple the Duration.

criticalFailure.@en: The horn does not call forth your god’s blessing, but warns of the end times. Anyone who can hear the trumpet’s blare suffers [[/roll 1D10+1]] mental Peril.

reagents.@en: A trumpet wrought into the shape of an eagle, held to your lips
